definition: former kings/former emperors/in Confucian writing, refers esp. to the sage rulers Yao 堯|尧[Yao2], Shun 舜[Shun4], Yu 禹[Yu3], Tang 湯|汤[Tang1] and the kings of Zhou
king or monarch/best or strongest of its type/grand/great

sentences.english: If the king was still alive, he could unite the Mon Calamari and the Quarren.
sentences.chinese: 如果先王還在位，他會聯合蒙卡拉馬里人和誇倫人。

sentences.english: 'Theory of Rites according to the Ancient Emperors' is Xunzi's view on rites' origin.
sentences.chinese: “先王制禮論”是荀子關於禮的起源的論述。

sentences.english: A queen dowager who is mother of the reigning sovereign.
sentences.chinese: 在位君主的母親，先王的遺孀。

sentences.english: The former king of Zenobia, husband to Floran, and father of Tristan and Jan.
sentences.chinese: 塞諾比亞先王，弗羅蘭的丈夫，特利斯坦和簡的父親。

sentences.english: There are many statuaries of our ancestors and Kings in the museums.
sentences.chinese: 在博物館裏，有許多我們祖先和先王的雕像。

definition: my late father/my ancestors/the late emperor
the (rightful) emperor/"Son of Heaven" (traditional English translation)
I (first person pronoun used by royalty or nobility)
to succeed to a title/to inherit
state/country/the Gods of earth and grain
Great Ancestor (posthumous title, e.g. for the founder of a dynasty)
